title: Gospel Movie Extract 6 From "The Mystery of Godliness"

json.text: Corrupt mankind needs salvation.
Why do we need salvation from the God incarnate?
This is the truth that most people need to understand.
This piece of God's word
"Corrupt Mankind Is More in Need of the Salvation of God Incarnated in the Flesh"
has revealed to us
the significance of God's incarnation in order to save corrupt mankind.
God becomes flesh to do the work of judgment here.
This is God's tremendous love.
Everyone, we used to judge and resist God all the time,
as we did not know God incarnate in the past time.
This causes transgressions and remorse.
But now, through Almighty God's word and your fellowship,
I understand some about the truth of incarnation. (Thank God.)
It's important to know the God incarnate. I see that now.
Yes, it's so important.
It directly focuses on whether we can be saved and what the ending for us is.
It was last night that I read the word of Almighty God,
This piece is so practical. It makes more sense to me. (Thanks be to God.)
It's very important.
Corrupt mankind needs salvation.
Why do we need salvation from the God incarnate?
This is the truth that most people need to understand.
Please fellowship more about it with us.
We need to understand the truth of it all. (Okay.)
Yes, please tell us more.
Well, I think there's no difference
between the work of God incarnate and that of men used by God.
Is it necessary to discuss that?
Spiritual figures and exegetes, they write books as well.
If God used those people, then they could save mankind! (That's right.)
I agree!
Brother Tao, I'm sorry I disagree.
There're too many such people. It can't work.
If spiritual figures could save mankind,
why haven't they done that yet? Tell me why not?
Yes.
If everything they've written was indeed the truth,
why do they themselves remain unsaved till now?
Yes. That's right.
That makes sense.
Furthermore, how many people who've read their books have actually been saved?
Tell me please, where are your facts to back this up?
Youâ€¦
Hey, everybody calm down now, please.
With regard as to why corrupt mankind has to be saved by the God incarnate,
I'm thinking that this question from Brother Liu is very important. (Yes.)
So, please go on. Please tell us more, Brother Lu. (Yes.)
This piece of God's word
"Corrupt Mankind Is More in Need of the Salvation of God Incarnated in the Flesh"
has revealed to us
the significance of God's incarnation in order to save corrupt mankind.
Let's read Almighty God's words.
Mengfu, will you read it? (Yes.)
Yes. Right.
Almighty God's words are stated so clearly. (Yes.)
From Almighty God's words, we realize
why mankind, which is thoroughly corrupt, has to be saved by God incarnate.
It's because man's flesh has been deceived and corrupted by Satan itself.
All of mankind lives under Satan's domain,
ignorant of good and evil, everything.
They don't know what are negative things and what are positive things.
They all live by Satan's philosophy, Satan's principles, and Satan's nature.
They're arrogant and conceited. They behave wildly and do what they want.
They become the embodiment of Satan.
People aren't aware that when they follow Satan, they resist God.
They don't follow Him.
God is the Creator. Only God knows everything about man's essence.
God knows best how deeply corrupted they are.
So only God can expose and dissect man's satanic nature and corrupt disposition.
God can tell man exactly how to live and how to be a human.
He can thoroughly conquer, purify, and save man.
Only God can see through man's corruption.
No one else can see this substance except God.
They can't give others the truth about being a man. (Yes.)
So then, in order for God to thoroughly save
the deeply corrupted mankind from Satan's hand,
God must be incarnated to express the truth and God's disposition.
Almighty God will tell them all the truths that they must possess.
They'll understand the truth and finally know God.
They will see through Satan's schemes and all of Satan's lies.
Man will rebel against and reject Satan, and turn to God fully. (Yes.)
Besides, God's work of incarnation is truly a revelation to everyone.
People are arrogant and conceited. They're too disobedient.
When God is incarnated to express the truth,
they'll have their own notions.
They'll put up a resistance and then start a battle.
Corrupt mankind resisting and betraying God is finally revealed.
God will carry out His judgment of man
according to their nature and corrupt disposition.
This is beneficial to God's conquering, perfecting, and saving man.
Man is gradually conquered and then purified in the judgment of the word of God.
Once man is completely conquered,
they will begin to be obedient to the God incarnate.
They will accept God's judgment and chastisement, and experience His work.
They'll make a resolution to pursue the truth,
no longer living by Satan's philosophies and rules.
When they live completely by God's word, that means God's defeated Satan.
Corrupt mankind then becomes God's spoils of war with Satan.
Finally, God has taken mankind back from Satan's hand once and for all. (Yes.)
Only the work of God incarnate can produce results such as these. (Yes.)
Very enlightening.
God saving man through incarnation is a necessity for everyone.
So only the incarnate God can conquer, save, and purify man effectively.
If He used man, then redeeming and saving man would simply never work out.
Yes.
Your fellowship makes more sense to me.
Because man has no truth or discernment, they're corrupted by Satan.
For God to save mankind, and secure and protect them from Satan's domain,
He has to contact them. That's the best way to save mankind.
He has to be face to face with them,
and express the truth to reveal and judge them.
Man will then be conquered.
They will turn to God finally and obey God's work fully.
Yes. Thanks be to God.
Only before God's word,
can man then be judged and purified face to face with God.
They'll all appreciate His almightiness and wisdom. (Praise God.)
Then they'll fall down before God.
They'll have reverence for God and truly repent to Him.
They'll submit to His work and be perfected by Him. (Right.)
Incarnation's the most effective way for God to save man.
If God did use man, it would never achieve the same results. (Yes. Right.)
Yes. God incarnate practically associates with man. That reveals so much.
Man's disobedience and man's substance will all emerge naturally.
Their imaginations, their notions and views will finally all be exposed.
In light of various corrupt expressions,
God expresses the truth to judge and purify man.
This is truly the best way for God to save man.
The God incarnate saving corrupt mankind through His words is practical.
Thanks be to God.
Yes. Only if God is incarnated and works among man personally,
expressing the complete truth according to man's corrupt nature and expression,
only then will man be saved and purified. (Mm.)
God's incarnation is what we as corrupt mankind easily need the most. (Mm.)
If people just believe in God in heaven,
and only know about empty theories,
and only talk about all those empty doctrines,
they'll never know or be saved by God. (That's right. Right. Yeah.)
Yes. Corrupt mankind
needs to be judged and purified by God incarnate face to face. This is true.
Only then can they be saved.
During contact between the incarnate God and man,
God can be made known and understood by man face to face.
Those who truly pursue the truth
by accepting judgment and purification from Christ of the last days
will naturally learn the lesson of obeying God, and generate love for God.
They will be saved from Satan's influence thoroughly by God.
Isn't this the best way for God to save, purify, and perfect man?
Yes. That is a good way.
Because God has become flesh,
mankind now has the chance to be face to face with God to experience His work,
to be supplied with God's accurate words
and be directly shepherded and watered by God.
Gradually mankind will start to obey God, and truly love God.
If God didn't become flesh to do the work of saving mankind,
then there wouldn't be such practical results. (Yes.)
Let's read Almighty God's words.
Wow. Thank God. So this is the truth. Mm. So true. Yeah.
When God becomes flesh to save corrupted man,
He can tell them in their language
God's requirements for them, disposition, and God's will.
Moreover, what God has and is is also communicated.
Without seeking or looking, man can understand God's will accurately,
know God's requirements and the ways to practice.
Meanwhile, they can understand and know God practically.
Just as in the Age of Grace, Peter asked the Lord Jesus,
The Lord Jesus told Peter plainly,
Here we know,
the incarnate Lord Jesus could sustain and feed man anytime, anywhere,
give them practical and definite provisions.
So then, Almighty God is then incarnated in the last days.
Directed at man's actual states, He expresses the truth,
God's disposition, and what God has and is to supply and sustain man.
He points out man's deviations and the mistakes in their beliefs.
He tells man God's will and requirements
and gives man the most practical and accurate supply for sustaining life.
For example,
when we rebel against God, and display resistance against God unknowingly,
God's words directly expose us and judge us,
making us see our satanic nature of hostility against God.
When we follow God with the intention of being blessed,
and believe it's the right thing to do,
God exposes us in light with what we lack
and tells us the right viewpoint on believing in God.
When we misunderstand God while experiencing His judgment,
God's word tells us His intention of how He'll save and judge us,
and dispels our misunderstandings against Him.
All God's chosen people deeply understand
God incarnate is the explicit presence that will help and supply us all.
We'll never need to search anywhere else.
We only need to read Almighty God's word,
and then we'll receive God's practical feeding and watering.
Within God's word, we gain some true knowledge of God's will and disposition,
and also some true knowledge of what God has and is.
Only then, can we know how we should pursue a true life,
and see through all of Satan's schemes.
We see the fact that we've been extremely corrupted by Satan.
Then we are gradually delivered from sin and the dark influence of Satan.
Our life disposition then gets changed, and we walk on the right path of life.
We live out the reality of the truth. (Yes.)
The results of these are made by God incarnate, the practical God. (Yes. Mm.)
Through Almighty God's word and your testimonies,
we see that corrupt mankind indeed needs the salvation of the incarnate God.
If God were not incarnated as a human being to work and live among man,
we would not receive the word,
and God's direct, practical shepherding and supply.
This is the way Jesus got in contact with man face to face
to supply them with a full life, and to teach them the truth. (That's right.)
Almighty God of the last days also speaks to all mankind face to face.
He supplies man and feeds man in a practical way. He solves man's problems,
but then, He exposes man's corruption and deals with man's disobedience.
He tells man God's will and God's requirement. He explains this plainly.
It's practical for man to believe in God and experience His work so.
Thanks be to God.
Only if God incarnate comes to judge and purify mankind
can they thoroughly be purified and saved. (Amen.)
God created man. Only God loves man in this way, and saves man.
The incarnate God does the work of salvation as the Son of man.
It reveals God's full love for man.
God incarnate suffered a lot to save all mankind.
He has to face man's resistance, and their notions, and their rebellious ways.
It's true. God's love for man is deep and so great. (Yes.)
Yes. But it's not easy for man to accept the incarnate God.
Wasn't Jesus nailed to the cross when He came to earth?
In order to accept the Lord Jesus Christ, one must be a man who loves the truth.
Yes.
They must make a lot of effort and investigate.
So the incarnate God sacrifices a lot in order to save all mankind. (Yes.)
It's really not easy for God to save all mankind. (That's right. Yes.)
The incarnate God has expressed so many truths.
If man rejects His work, how disobedient they are!
Mankind is really blind if they don't know God. (Yes.)
Yes. God became flesh to work and speak.
Man gains provision that's practical and just from God.
Though man has their notions about God incarnate doing the work of judgment,
God brings them the way of life and eternal salvation. (Yes.)
God supports man throughout their whole life. (Mm.)
Let us read Almighty God's words. (Okay. Mm.)
Brother Lu. Can we read the book of Almighty God's word?
Oh, great!
Sure. That's great! (That's really great!)
Brother Lin, we've been waiting for this day.
We also want to read Almighty God's word! (Yes, we want to read, too.)
Brothers and sisters! We've got the books of God's word ready for you!
All right. I'll get them.
Thank you. Praise God.
Thank you. Praise God.
Praise God.
Thank God! I finally see God's word! Praise God.
Thank God!
Everyone! Let us read Almighty God's word!
Please turn to page 1347.
God becomes flesh in the last days to save and perfect man.
Although He's just an ordinary Son of man,
with no incredible traits, no lofty or great image, and no wonders He has done,
and all mankind has many notions about Christ,
denies Him, resists Him, and rejects Him,
the truth that Christ expresses and the judgment work He does
allow man to acquire the supply of God's word and the truth of God's word.
We can fully see God's appearance. (Yes.)
Although we haven't seen the real person of God,
we've seen God's inherent disposition and His holy substance.
So it's like we've seen His real person
and seen God living among us, true and real.
And we truly feel that we have been raptured before His throne.
Amen! Praise God.
We experience God's work face to face in our life.
We enjoy the full supply of the living water from the throne. (Amen!)
Through experiencing God's work of judgment,
we gradually understand God's kind intention of saving man.
God suffered a great deal for saving us. The price was very high.
Everything God does for man is love and salvation.
We hate our disobedience, all our past inhumanity toward God.
We have true love and obedience to God.
Up until this day, we have all truly realized
that we have changed a great deal because of the salvation of God incarnate.
Christ of the last days
is the greatest salvation to the corrupt mankind. (Yes. It is.)
Christ is the only way for man to know God and gain His approval. (Amen!)
Let us read Almighty God's words.
Please turn to page 1454.
Thank God. Good. That's right. Yeah.
Because God is incarnated as a man to do the work of salvation on earth,
we're fortunate that we all survive until now.
Once God's work of salvation ends, I'm afraid disasters will fall.
Mankind will suffer unprecedented calamities.
Right. If it were not for God's incarnation,
all of mankind would have long been destroyed.
I'm afraid we would not be alive today.
Everyone, let us read Almighty God's word.
Now please turn to page 1456.
Brother Lu, can I read it? (All right.)
Right. Yeah.
Let's turn to page 1457.
Brother Wang, would you read it please? (Mm.)
Yes.
Yes.
Yes. I'm blind and ignorant. I don't have any knowledge of God.
The incarnate God's purpose of working is all for completely saving mankind.
God is saving us and bringing us to a good destination.
That's right. (Mm. Yes.)
The supreme God humbles Himself as a man to save us.
I didn't welcome Him, but I looked up at the God in heaven,
and desired to go to the kingdom of heaven. I'm arrogant and conceited.
When I faced the incarnate God,
I didn't see His humble nature and loveliness I should have seen.
I harbored notions about Him. I rejected and disobeyed Him.
I'm too corrupt, arrogant. I'm nothing but a fool. (Yes.)
But now I finally realize,
God becomes flesh to do the work of judgment here.
This is God's tremendous love. (Yes.)
We accept God who is incarnated in the last days,
and we are raptured before Him.
Only thus do we have the hope of being saved.
Yes. Thank God for His incarnation. We're so fortunate.
Thanks be to God.
We have the hope of being saved now. Thank the Lord.
That's right. We have hope now.
(sigh)
During the past decades of my life,
I was always admiring those who followed the Lord Jesus.
They lived with the Lord every day.
They were face to face with Him. They listened to His word directly.
What a wonderful blessing it was! (Amen!)
What a wonderful blessing indeed.
During these years of believing in God,
I expect to finally meet the Lord and live with Him, every minute of the day.
Today, this dream of mine has finally come true. (Yes.)
It's definitely God's special grace,
an absolute blessing the God incarnate brings to everyone on the earth! (Amen!)
All of our expectations these years have finally been realized at last.
We've now seen the Lord's appearance, being face to face with the Lord.
Yes, thanks be to God.
God personally became flesh to do the judgment work and chastisement.
Now man's salvation and entry into the kingdom of heaven is possible for us all!
Praise the Lord. Yes. Praise be to God.
This is a once in a million lifetime opportunity! (Amen!)
We're so blessed. It's amazing.
I know. You're right. The thought of being face to face with the Lord â€¦
makes me feel â€¦
just so happy.
All my life, I never thought I'd meet the Lord. (Yes.)
This is my dream in my life long belief in the Lord!
Yes! It's so right. (I feel the same way!)
And now it finally comes true! (Yes! Amen! Yeah! Thank God!)
Praise the Lord!
